comments: Basically, she will be nice to you and spend extra time helping you as long as she likes you. But her lectures are not good, she hardly tells you any relevant information, and she is really rude. Like really rude. I didn\'t learn anything in her class, I learned all relevant info from other teachers. She should stick to administrative duties.

Semester is over with ONE day left for professors to turn in grades. The entire class STILL does not know their grades for both of her classes. She has not given us our grades ONCE this sem, because shes too "busy" to update our grades for us. She talks down on students making them feel dumb sometimes. My least favorite teacher in the program

She is nice but when it comes to teaching she is no help. Ask a question & she doesnt answer it. Talks a lot about herself & goes off topic a lot. Kind of unorganized & doesnt let you know your grade for more than half the semester

talks about herself. late for class and will blame you for the class being behind schedule. shes unorganized. she is her own queen. nothing will be good enough. just keep your head up and get through it when in her class.
Talks about herself most of the class. Not a hard grader if she likes you. Just ask her questions about herself and you will be ok.
